changelog:
feat: Add Settings Page with Theme and Attendance Settings

- Implemented a new SettingsPage allowing users to select app themes (System Default, Light, Dark) and adjust minimum attendance percentage via a slider.
- Integrated navigation to About and Feedback pages.

feat: Introduce Firebase Service for Student Data Management

- Added FirebaseService class to handle saving student data to Firestore, including student details and attendance records.

feat: Add ContineoServices for User Login

- Created ContineoServices class with a placeholder for user login functionality.

feat: Enhance Update Checker with Beta Update Support

- Updated UpdateChecker to handle beta and stable update channels based on user preferences.
- Improved user experience with dynamic update dialogs and permission handling for APK installation.
